section.p: Helpless in the grip of the storm, the vessel cracks apart. The seawater rushes into the broken shell of the hull, dragging you down. The screams of your crewmen are drowned out by the howl of the storm. Cross the ship and crew off your Ship’s Manifest. You can think of nothing now but saving yourself.

.
If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned - .
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you are swept miraculously towards a rocky shore. Lose 2-12 Stamina points and (if you can survive that) turn to 559 in Cities of Gold and Glory.
